programme.title: Kyle está doente e sua mãe está tentando curar ele através da sabedoria de medicina natural uma velha curandeira e seus colaboradores "nativos americanos". Enquanto isso, senhor Garrison se transforma em escritor de novelas românticas.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Os Abutres Têm Fome, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: Nesta aventura desenfreada e anárquica que se desenrola no México do século XIX, o mercenário americano Hogan salva a freira Sara dos seus pretensos molestadores.

programme.title: O Ouro de Mackenna, (1979, Western)
programme.desc: Gregory Peck e Omar Sharif lutam para descobrir um lendário esconderijo de ouro, nesta espetacular aventura no Velho Oeste..

programme.title: O Grande Búfalo Branco, (1977, Western)
programme.desc: Em setembro de 1874 Wild Bill Hickok vai para o Velho Oeste, usando o nome de James Otis, pois precisa caçar um búfalo branco que sempre lhe provoca estranhos pesadelos.

programme.title: Arizona Violento, (1955, Western)
programme.desc: Quando John Stewart dá refúgio à namorada de Wick Campbell, Campbell se volta contra ele.

programme.title: O Pequeno Grande Homem, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: A história do Velho-Oeste contada através dos olhos de Jack Crabb, sequestrado pelos índios quando criança e que acabou vivendo dos dois lados: homens brancos e "seres humanos", como os índios chamavam a si mesmos.

programme.title: Santo Antonio: Cidade sem Lei, (1946, Western)
programme.desc: 1877, sudoeste do Texas. Milhares de cabeças de gado eram empurradas para o norte do estado, sem que haja controle algum.

programme.title: Keoma, (1976, Western)
programme.desc: Ao final da Guerra Civil Americana, um pistoleiro mestiço, cansado de fazer da morte um meio de vida, retorna para aquilo que um dia costumava ser seu lar.

programme.title: Shalako, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Shalako está conduzindo uma expedição de caça em uma zona selvagem no Novo México.

programme.title: Meu Nome é Ninguém, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: O honesto advogado Black Jack Gideon envolve-se na procura de um valioso e raro pônei japonês, que foi sequestrado, e por quem o bando de desertores renegados exige uma fabulosa quantia de resgate.

programme.title: Como assaltar um banco, (2018, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Ruggero é um homem tranquilo, mas impulsivamente decide roubar um banco para provar que é corajoso o suficiente para sua ex-mulher, que o abandonou.

programme.title: Assassinos de Aluguel, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Inspirado na história real de um escândalo que envolveu presidiários sendo liberados por um dia para trabalharem como assassinos de aluguel para políticos corruptos.

programme.title: Valan - Vale dos Anjos, (2019, Crime)
programme.desc: O policial Peter investiga diversos desaparecimentos de jovens mulheres em um caso de rede de tráfico sexual.

programme.title: Acima Da Lei, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma mulher pede a seu ex-marido, um advogado renomado, que defenda seu irmão criminoso, acusado de matar um promotor público.

programme.title: Assassinato em Sparrow Creek, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Um antigo policial que agora trabalha como miliciano investiga um tiroteio que aconteceu em seu bairro. Porém, tudo fica mais complicado quando ele descobre que alguém da sua própria milícia pode ter sido o responsável.

programme.title: O Passageiro das Trevas, (2020, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Emerson é uma motorista de táxi acostumada a enfrentar passageiros inconvenientes, problemas e mal entendidos.

programme.title: Como assaltar um banco, (2018, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Ruggero é um homem tranquilo, mas impulsivamente decide roubar um banco para provar que é corajoso o suficiente para sua ex-mulher, que o abandonou.

programme.title: Um homem sem passado, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: Noam é um morador de rua que sofre de amnésia e é constantemente assombrado por pesadelos de seu passado. Após presenciar a morte de seu único amigo, ele decide buscar por justiça, ainda que isso custe ter o seu misterioso passado revelado.

programme.title: Todas As Formas De Amor, (2020, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Um conto entrelaçado de três histórias, todas unidas pelo amor, perdão, comprometimento e lealdade entre casais, parentes e amigos. Enquanto novas jornadas começam, o amor persiste e evoluiu, tomando várias formas.

programme.title: Não Adianta Rezar, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A vida de Anna finalmente está entrando nos eixos. Traumatizada depois de um conturbado divórcio e de uma intensa luta para se livrar de sua dependência química, ela finalmente vai se mudar de vida.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos 2 - O Contágio, (2005, Horror)
programme.desc: Em 1968, os militares destroem uma instalação após a liberação de uma bactéria. Nos dias atuais, um paciente saindo de uma instituição psiquiátrica encontra um velho tubo de vácuo que, ao ser aberto, libera bactérias que transformam as pessoas em zumbis.

programme.title: O feitiço da Casa Whaley, (2012, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Quando um guia de turismo invade a Casa Mais Assombrada dos Estados Unidos, um pouco de caça aos fantasmas amadores com amigos se transforma em mais horror do que eles jamais poderiam imaginar.

programme.title: Fada Dos Dentes, (2019, Monsters)
programme.desc: O conto de uma fada dos dentes mortal ganha vida e começa a aterrorizar uma pequena comunidade.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 6 Cabeças, (2018, Creature Features)
programme.desc: O que deveria ser um acampamento de treinamento de casamento em uma ilha remota se transforma no teste final de sobrevivência quando um tubarão de 6 cabeças começa a atacar a Praia.

programme.title: Mega Python vs. Gatoroid, (2011, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Depois que uma espécie de píton gigante invade os pântanos, os guardas florestais criam jacarés mutantes para combater a ameaça. Logo, a batalha entre enormes pítons e enormes jacarés ameaça toda a Flórida.

programme.title: Lenda Do Homem Lagarto, (2023, Monsters)
programme.desc: Um grupo de jovens descobre que o Homem Lagarto não é um mito enquanto luta pela sobrevivência.

programme.title: Maldita Aranha Assassina, (2013, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: A cidade de Los Angeles tem um grande problema pela frente. Uma aranha gigante acaba de escapar de um laboratório e está aterrorizando os moradores da cidade.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos 2 - O Contágio, (2005, Horror)
programme.desc: Em 1968, os militares destroem uma instalação após a liberação de uma bactéria. Nos dias atuais, um paciente saindo de uma instituição psiquiátrica encontra um velho tubo de vácuo que, ao ser aberto, libera bactérias que transformam as pessoas em zumbis.

programme.title: Forças do Mal, (2007, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: Cinco histórias macabras giram em torno de um controle remoto, um rádio estranho, uma garota de programa assassina (Camille Lacey), um noivado e um fantasma.

programme.title: Suikotsu não pode matar Chiyo e os outros. Após isso, Suikotsu e Jakotsu vão para dentro do local sagrado e esperam por Sesshomaru.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Ginkotsu morre e Renkotsu usa seu fragmento sem permissão. Ao fazê-lo, ele traiu Bankotsu. Ele deseja ainda mais poder e ataca Kuga para que ele possa pegar os fragmentos da Jóia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O mal dentro do Monte Hakurei são os youkais de Narak. Mirok arrisca sua vida para salvar Sango e suga todos os youkais com seu ataque junto com os insetos venenosos e entra em colapso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Mirok e Sango ficam cara a cara com a múmia de Hakushin no Monte Hakurei. O santo diz a eles o motivo de ajudar Narak.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha recupera seus poderes, derrota Jakotsu e se apressa para o Monte Hakurei. Renkotsu tem sentimentos rebeldes em relação ao Bankotsu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A barreira do Monte Hakurei desaparece e Inuyasha está preocupado com a Agome, que vai para o Monte com Kuga e os outros. Enquanto isso, Kikyo e Sesshomaru sentiram que algo estranho aconteceu em diferentes locais.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Batalha Decisiva! O Último e Mais Forte dos Guerreiros Zumbis

programme.title: Mirok e Sango veem um misterioso pedaço de carne nas profundezas do Monte Hakurei. Sesshomaru e Kikyo sentem algo estranho acontecendo em diferentes locais e seguem para o Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Poderosa Banryu; Duelo Mortal no Monte Hakurei

programme.title: Narak ganhou um novo corpo e renasceu. Inuyasha tenta derrotá-lo com seu ataque, mas ele se defende e fere Agome, Mirok e os outros. Enquanto isso, Kikyo vê Kagura escapando do Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O Monte Hakurei é destruído e Kuga acaba caindo, mas Inuyasha o salva. Quando ele se encontra com Agome e os outros, que estão tentando escapar o mais rápido possível, ele vê uma ilusão de Kikyo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha é afastado de seus amigos quando é enganado por informações falsas de que Kikyo ainda está viva. Enquanto isso, Agome e os outros estão em uma certa cidade do castelo e são capturados.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Escuridão do Coração de Agome

programme.title: O bebê de Narak guia Agome para um templo abandonado. Ele ordena que Kagura coloque um fragmento corrompido da Jóia nela, mas Agome recupera a consciência.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Na Era Antiga, Narak encontra um novo youkai para procurar os fragmentos da Jóia. Enquanto isso, Agome retorna aos dias atuais e descobre que sua escola está no meio da preparação para um festival cultural.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: No dia do festival cultural, os youkais que Agome trouxe do Japão feudal são revividos. Eles devoram a comida que Yuka e os outros fizeram.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Youkais Invadem o Festival Cultural

programme.title: Um youkai é revivido e começa a roubar garotas e um jovem procura ajuda de Kaede. Inuyasha tem que derrotar esse novo youkai.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Cinco irmãos raposas youkais acreditam que Shippo é um herói. Eles se tornam seus discípulos para aprender sua técnica especial, que na verdade é do Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo se encontram com Shinosuke, que está procurando por sua noiva. Eles são agrupados em uma vila só de mulheres e são separados.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Em uma aldeia onde vivem apenas mulheres, um youkai que foi selado em um pergaminho, é revivido.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Confissão Mais Perigosa de Mirok

programme.title: Uma mulher misteriosa aparece diante de Sesshomaru. Sara foi trazida de volta à vida e roubou a Tessaiga de Inuyasha e transformou Mirok e Sango em estátuas.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Mulher que Amou Sesshomaru: Parte 1

programme.title: Sara pede a Sesshomaru que a destrua junto com o espírito, ele obedece e usa a Tessaiga para destruir Sara junto com o espírito.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Mulher que Amou Sesshomaru: Parte 2

programme.title: Mushin, a pessoa que criou Mirok, vai morrer. Eles perguntam a Mushin o que ele quer para que eles possam lhe dar um último presente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Último Banquete do Mestre Mirok

programme.title: Um youkai invisível que rouba tesouros surgiu. Uma velha que não conseguiu derrotá-lo pede ajuda a Inuyasha e o grupo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Um ancestral de Hojo está em uma jornada para oferecer a herança da família Hojo, uma espada demoníaca. Inuyasha e seu grupo o acompanham.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Nome do Ancestral é Agome

programme.title: A lâmina de Ken traz desastre e Akitoki e Inuyasha viajam para o santuário para selar os poderes demoníacos da lâmina.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Sobrevivente em uma Terra Infestada por Youkais

programme.title: Hoshiyomi usa a lâmina Ken para roubar os poderes demoníacos da Tessaiga. Ele captura Agome e diz a Inuyasha para ir ao santuário dos deuses do vento e do trovão.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Grande Duelo na Cascata Shoun

programme.title: Tsukiyomi, que deveria estar morto, possui Agome e aparece diante de Hoshiyomi.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O bebê de Narak está trazendo sacerdotes virtuosos perto da morte e perscrutando suas mentes. Ele está tentando investigar o local que liga os mundos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O bebê de Narak foi dividido em dois. Metade volta à vida na forma de uma criança vestida de branco.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Kanta é uma criança youkai lontra. A cabeça de seu pai foi tomada por Hakudoshi e ele procura o corpo de seu pai.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Viagem em Busca do Pai

programme.title: O local entre este mundo e o próximo, onde está o fragmento da Jóia, é o cemitério do pai de Inuyasha .
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e o grupo chegam na terra do fogo. Eles descobrem um portal gigante dentro de uma caverna nas montanhas.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Quando a passagem na Terra do Fogo se abriu, Agome sentiu a presença do fragmento da Jóia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Abi, A Incontrolável Manipuladora de Aves

programme.title: Quando Kaede ainda era criança, sua irmã mais velha Kikyo ficou responsável por proteger a Jóia de youkais.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Trágica Canção de Amor do Destino: Parte 1

programme.title: Kikyou passou dias extenuantes lutando contra youkais, até que um dia, um meio-youkai chamado Inuyasha apareceu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Trágica Canção de Amor do Destino: Parte 2

programme.title: Jotaro pede ajuda a Josuke para caçar um rato que consegue usar um Stand. Depois, eles encontram algo bizarro no canal de irrigação onde o rato foi visto.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Koichi e Rohan encontram algo estranho em um beco não identificado no mapa da cidade. Pressentindo ainda mais confusão, Rohan acha que é o ataque de um Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Okuyasu veem pequenos Stands pegando moedas na rua. Eles vão atrás deles e conhecem um garoto chamado Shigechi. Josuke tem uma ideia.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke, Okuyasu e Shigechi vão ao banco receber o prêmio da loteria. Lá, o banqueiro faz de tudo para provar que o bilhete premiado não é deles e Josuke entra em ação.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Yukako vai a uma estética para dar um trato no visual e atrair Koichi. O plano dá certo, mas o efeito dura só meia hora.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Yukako Yamagishi sonha em ser Cinderella

programme.title: Sem querer, Shigechi pega a marmita de Yoshikage Kira, que tenta recuperá-la antes que seu segredo seja revelado.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Yoshikage Kira quer uma vida tranquila – Parte 1

programme.title: Shigechi consegue fugir de Kira. Gravemente ferido, ele tenta ir até Josuke para ser curado e avisá-lo que Kira é uma ameaça.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Yoshikage Kira quer uma vida tranquila – Parte 2

programme.title: Jotaro avisa Koichi para ter muito cuidado e o impede de perseguir Kira, mas Koichi abaixa a guarda e é atacado pelo Stand explosivo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kira, o assassino em série, aparece e Koichi fica indignado. Kira ainda está furioso por ter sido humilhado em público e o agride.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke e Jotaro vasculham a casa onde Kira vivia e descobrem uma coleção esquisita. Uma câmera Polaroid em uma mesa tira uma foto deles.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Yoshihiro Kira procura usuários de Stand para ajudá-lo a proteger o filho. Um rapaz pede a Rohan, que está perseguindo Kira, para jogar pedra, papel ou tesoura.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O pivete do Janken vem aí!

programme.title: Kira vive como Kosaku Kawajiri, mas tem vontade de matar depois de ver o pescoço da esposa. Josuke e Okuyasu encontram um homem estranho em um campo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan suspeita que Josuke está trapaceando nos dados e aposta que consegue descobrir como. Se Rohan ganhar a próxima rodada, Josuke perderá um dedo mindinho.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Josuke é perseguido por um Stand e tem que andar de bicicleta a mais de 60 km/h para não ser pego. Ele tenta ligar para Koichi, mas ainda não é seguro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kawajiri vai até o porão para confrontar um gato com um buraco na garganta, mas o encontra morto. No dia seguinte, uma planta estranha cresce na sepultura do gato.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Convencido de que Kawajiri é seu filho, Yoshihiro faz de tudo para protegê-lo de Jotaro. Josuke e Okuyasu descobrem um homem que vive em uma torre de energia.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Masazo Kinoto, um arquiteto excêntrico, visita Rohan para inspecionar a casa danificada pelo fogo. Josuke e Kanedaichi lutam na torre.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan fica em apuros depois de ver as costas de Kinoto. Um jovem surge diante de Josuke com um papel dobrado que esconde algo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Rohan não pode expor as costas e pede ajuda a Koichi, que não acredita nele. Apesar do risco que corre, Rohan vai ao hotel de Jotaro.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kawajiri finalmente acaba com Hayato. Depois de saberem o que houve com Hayato, Rohan e os outros vão verificar a casa de Kawajiri.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Hayato percebe que todos os que ficam sabendo de Yoshikage Kira através dele morrem e que, depois disso, a mesma manhã se repete.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kira pretende remover o terceiro poder, Bites The Dust, porque Hayato matou várias pessoas e voltou à mesma manhã. Mas alguém surge diante de Kira.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Uma bomba de ar invade a casa onde Josuke e Hayato estão escondidos. Nenhum dos dois sabe como a bomba conseguiu detectá-los.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Mesmo encurralado, Kira não desiste. Ele usa o Bites The Dust em uma socorrista e tenta explodir o tempo ativando o detonador pelo Deadly Queen.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Adeus, Morioh – O coração de ouro

programme.title: Com o Stand mais apropriado, Koichi Hirose chega a Nápoles em busca de Haruno Shiobana, suspeito de ser filho de Dio Brando.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A vida de Giorno, uma criança abandonada, muda quando ele ajuda um mafioso a escapar da morte. Giorno aprende mais sobre seus poderes ao enfrentar Bruno Bucciarati.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Determinado a ingressar na máfia, Giorno vai à prisão falar com Polpo, um dos principais membros da Passione, e recebe um teste de iniciação impossível.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Conheça o gângster atrás do muro

programme.title: Giorno luta contra o Stand de Polpo, que pode se movimentar livremente pelas sombras. Koichi conta a Giorno sobre a flecha que produz um Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Quando a notícia do tesouro escondido de Polpo se espalha entre os membros da Passione, Bucciarati e seu bando partem para pegá-lo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Em busca da fortuna de Polpo!

programme.title: Com o desaparecimento misterioso da tripulação de Bucciarati no convés, Abbacchio lança seu Stand, Moody Jazz, para investigar esse preocupante fenômeno.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O bando descobre que sua chegada a Capri reserva um perigo. Com Giorno, Mista começa a neutralizar o inimigo com seu Stands, o Six Bullets.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Mista é atraído para um caminhão em movimento. Nele, o Stand de Sale, Arts & Crafts, mostra sua habilidade de controlar as balas do Six Bullet.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Bucciarati entrega as joias de Polpo ao Chefe, Pericolo, e é promovido a caporegime da Passione.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Shin-Ultraman, (2022, Adventure)
programme.desc: A Terra está sob ataque. Invasores alienígenas, conhecidos como Espécie Classe S, devastam o planeta. A humanidade, em sua luta desesperada pela sobrevivência, deposita sua esperança em um gigante guerreiro vindo do espaço.

programme.title: Um Garoto no Palácio de Aladim, (1998, Children)
programme.desc: Calvin, um jovem entregador de pizza, é confundido com o "Grande Libertador" por um gênio, que o atrai de volta ao século VIII, onde deve unir forças com Ali Babá para salvar toda a Arábia do irmão maligno de Aladim, Luxor.

programme.title: Os Dragões De Camelot, (2013, Adventure)
programme.desc: Uma feiticeira cruel assume Camelot e usa três dragões mortais para caçar os restantes Cavaleiros da Távola Redonda.

programme.title: Thor - Caçada ao Ladrão, (2010, Adventure)
programme.desc: Tom treinou o pastor alemão Thor e aprendeu muitas habilidades. Com sua namorada Mirjam, eles têm aventuras emocionantes. Nas férias, a diversão vira enrascada quando a família é confundida com bandidos e precisa provar sua inocência.

programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Um antigo chefe da máfia japonesa suspeita de ser vítima de um ataque e deixa uma recompensa para a pessoa que encontrar o seu assassino.

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey é um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japão para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instrução progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendário Yoroi Bitsu, um baú blindado contendo as armas do último Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Police Story 2 - Codinome: Radical, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Os métodos incomuns de um policial de Hong Kong levam ao seu rebaixamento para o trânsito, apesar do sucesso. Enquanto isso, um antigo inimigo sai da prisão em busca de vingança.

programme.title: O Dragão Invencível, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: Um agente da polícia à paisana procura vingança contra um sindicato do crime implacável após o assassinato do seu parceiro.

programme.title: Dragões para Sempre, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie é contratado para defender uma empresa acusada de poluir as águas da cidade. Ao descobrir que eles produzem drogas, Jackie decide mudar de lado.​

programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Um antigo chefe da máfia japonesa suspeita de ser vítima de um ataque e deixa uma recompensa para a pessoa que encontrar o seu assassino.

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey é um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japão para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instrução progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendário Yoroi Bitsu, um baú blindado contendo as armas do último Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Vale da Luta, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Depois que a jovem Tori é encontrada morta, sua irmã Windsor inicia uma investigação por conta própria e descobre que ela lutava para pagar suas despesas.

programme.title: Metendo os Pés Pelas Mãos, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Danny McBride estrela esta comédia como Fred Simmons, um mestre de Tae Kwon Do incompetente, egoísta e agressivo que coordena seu dojo com mão de ferro.

programme.title: 12 Angry Men, (1957, Drama)
programme.desc: Eleven jurors are convinced that the defendant is guilty of murder. The twelfth has no doubt of his innocence. How can this one man steer the others toward the same conclusion? Henry Fonda and Lee J. Cobb lead the all-star cast in this classic!

programme.title: In Harm's Way, (1965, War)
programme.desc: Producer-director Otto Preminger’s epic treatment of the bombing of Pearl Harbor details the devastating attack on the Hawaiian naval base as well as the explosive, behind-the-scenes stories.

programme.title: Strategic Air Command, (1955, War)
programme.desc: Aviation and sports come together as a baseball player is recalled to Air Force duty.

programme.title: The High and the Mighty, (1954, War)
programme.desc: John Wayne plays Dan Roman, a veteran pilot haunted by a tragic past. Now relegated to second-incommand cockpit assignments, he finds himself scheduled on a routine Honolulu-to-San Francisco flight – one that takes a terrifying turn.

programme.title: The Stranger, (1946, Drama)
programme.desc: An investigator from the War Crimes Commission travels to Connecticut to find an infamous Nazi

programme.title: The Hound Of The Baskervilles, (1959, Crime)
programme.desc: A hellish hound feeds upon the flesh of the heirs of Baskerville Hall. But before this beast can sink its teeth into the newest lord, it must pit its vicious fangs against the searing intellect of Sherlock Holmes (Peter Cushing) and Dr. Watson.

programme.title: Stalag 17, (1953, War)
programme.desc: Laced with comedy and cynicism, this is the story of a group of GIs who are thrown together in the notorious German prison camp Stalag 17, their suspicions about one being a spy and their efforts to escape.

programme.title: Some Like It Hot, (1959, Comedy)
programme.desc: This hysterical comedy from director Billy Wilder finds Tony Curtis and Jack Lemmon masquerading as women in order to elude irate Chicago mobsters while befriending a beautiful singer (Marilyn Monroe).

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II, (2000, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: The world's greatest spy, Ethan Hunt, returns and partners up with the beautiful Nyah Hall to stop renegade agent Sean Ambrose from releasing a new kind of terror on an unsuspecting world.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III, (2006, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt hurdles into spectacular new adventures from Rome to Shanghai as he races to rescue a captured agent and stop Davian from eliminating his next target, Ethan’s wife.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible, (1996, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt, a secret agent, is framed for the deaths of his espionage team and attempts to flee government assassins after him. He races against the clock in order to discover the truth.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II, (2000, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: The world's greatest spy, Ethan Hunt, returns and partners up with the beautiful Nyah Hall to stop renegade agent Sean Ambrose from releasing a new kind of terror on an unsuspecting world.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III, (2006, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt hurdles into spectacular new adventures from Rome to Shanghai as he races to rescue a captured agent and stop Davian from eliminating his next target, Ethan’s wife.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol, (2011, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Agent Ethan Hunt and his elite team go underground after a bombing implicates them as terrorists. While trying to clear their name, the team uncovers a plot to start a nuclear war.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation, (2018, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Ethan and team take on their most impossible mission yet, eradicating the Syndicate - an International rogue organization as highly skilled as they are, committed to destroying the IMF.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible, (1996, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt, a secret agent, is framed for the deaths of his espionage team and attempts to flee government assassins after him. He races against the clock in order to discover the truth.

programme.title: The Faculty, (1998, Horror)
programme.desc: A group of small-town high school students discovers their teachers are under the control of mind-controlling alien parasites. From a smart script by Kevin Williamson (SCREAM), and directed by action-expert Robert Rodriguez (FROM DUSK TO DAWN).

programme.title: 28 Days Later, (2002, Horror)
programme.desc: Animal rights activists free a group of infected chimps to horrifying results. 28 days later, Jim wakes from a coma and explores a deserted London. He soon learns the truth behind the deserted streets and the menacing creatures that lurk in the shadows.

programme.title: Succubus, (2024, Supernatural Horror)

programme.title: Devon, (2024, Slashers and Serial Killers)

programme.title: Let Me In (2010), (2011, Vampires)
programme.desc: Owen, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Abby (Chloë Grace Moretz of KICK-ASS), a beautiful but peculiar girl who turns out to be a vampire.

programme.title: Hannibal Rising, (2007, Thriller)
programme.desc: Young Hannibal moves in with his aunt and begins plotting revenge after his baby sister is killed during World War II. Based on Thomas Harris' novel.

programme.title: Rogue (2007), (2008, Creature Features)
programme.desc: A rugged American adventure-travel journalist on assignment in the Australian outback encounters a man-eating crocodile.

programme.title: Crawl, (2019, Creature Features)

programme.title: May, (2003, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc:
May grew up as a lonely oddball whose only friend was a perfectly kept doll. When she moves to L.A., she takes up with a handsome filmmaker and then an alluring lesbian, but every connection she makes turns out deadly.
Rated R

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Koichi Hirose (Reverb)

programme.title: God Mars
programme.desc: The Crasher Squad finally lands on Planet Gishin. However, the evil Emperor Zule is determined to defeat Takeru, even if it means destroying Planet Gishin along with him.
programme.sub-title: A New Bond, Separation And Departure!

programme.title: God Mars
programme.desc: A month has past since the battle on Planet Gishin. The Crasher Squad, who has been newly assigned to Ceres Space Station, rescues a girl named Flore out in space.

programme.title: God Mars
programme.desc: Flore, a negative Esper, shows nothing but intense animosity against Takeru, who is a positive Esper. Then, a ship from Planet Marmelo appears and demands they hand over Flore.
programme.sub-title: The Fate Of The Positive Espers Versus The Negative Espers

programme.title: God Mars
programme.desc: A mysterious pirate ship suddenly appears near the space station, as though they were guided by Flore's telepathy.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: While Gon is on his date with Palm, Killua encounters Rammot in the forest. Just when their battle is about to begin, Killua hears his brother's voice in his head, telling him to run away.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Knuckle and Morel appear to be overwhelmed by the speed of Cheetu's attacks, but they have a chance at victory.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Kalluto, Feitan, Shalnark, Phinks, Shizuku, and Bonolenov meet in Meteor City, the home of the Phantom Troupe. They have returned after getting the news that the Chimera Ant, Zazan, has built her nest in their city.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: The members of the Phantom Troupe go to Zazan's nest to defeat her. The Troupe splits up to confront Zazan's minions individually. As they battle, each member of the Troupe reveals their secret ability.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Gon and Killua arrive in a village in East Gorteau but find no trace of the inhabitants.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: A pair of Chimera Ants appears and hunts Gon under the cover of night, overwhelming him with their attacks. Feeling that things are at a standstill, he gathers up his Nen and prepares to throw a punch.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Knuckle and Shoot are lying in wait for Cheetu. But just as Cheetu is about to approach them, he suddenly changes direction and disappears. Meanwhile, Killua and Gon sense that someone is following them again.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: The assassin Ikalgo, an octopus-type Chimera Ant, attacks Killua with his Nen Abilities. Killua captures him and tells Ikalgo that he'll let him live if he divulges his ally's abilities.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Gon tries to bond with a Chimera Ant called Meleoron, even though it's risky for a Nen user to reveal his abilities.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: The King is killing time as he awaits the selection. He calls upon masters of shogi and go and defeats every one of them.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: Knov is making his way to the palace. The Chimera Ants Leol and Flutter follow him to try to determine his abilities, but they lose sight of him.

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER
programme.desc: The King is annoyed and confounded after meeting Komugi, the unfathomable Gungi world champion. But at the same time, he is having fun.

programme.desc: Josuke and Koichi get info that a student at their school, Toshikazu Hazamada may be a Stand user and decide to look into the case. Their suspicions are quickly confirmed after Hazamada’s wooden doll morphs into an exact copy of Josuke and attacks them.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Yukako Yamagishi Falls in Love, Part 1

programme.sub-title: Yukako Yamagishi Falls in Love, Part 1

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Yukako Yamagishi Falls in Love, Part 2
programme.desc: Yukako’s dangerous obsession with reshaping Koichi into a man fit for her gets worse, prompting Koichi to hatch an escape plan. He tries to call Josuke for help using a nearby pay phone but is stopped by Yukako, who anticipated his move.
programme.sub-title: Yukako Yamagishi Falls in Love, Part 2

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Let’s Go Eat Some Italian Food
programme.desc: Josuke and Okuyasu come across an Italian restaurant owned by an Italian chef named Tonio. When Okuyasu asks for the menu, Tonio explains that he decides the menu on the spot based on the customer he sees.
programme.sub-title: Let’s Go Eat Some Italian Food

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Chili Pepper, Part 1
programme.desc: Chili Pepper suddenly appears before Josuke to test his Stand powers. Josuke puts up a fight but is overwhelmed by Chili Pepper’s power. The next day, Josuke and friends learn from Jotaro that a man who can locate Chili Pepper is heading to Morioh

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Chili Pepper, Part 2
programme.desc: Josuke and his friends gather at the Port to try and reach Joseph Joestar before Chili Pepper. Speculating the enemy is hiding nearby, Jotaro orders Josuke and Koichi to stay behind and find Chili Pepper’s user while he and Okuyasu go protect Joseph.

programme.sub-title: Let's Go to the Manga Artist's House, Part 1

programme.title: God Mars

programme.title: HUNTERxHUNTER

programme.desc: After making a horrific discovery in the basement of a old church, Trish and her brother Darry watch their routine road trip home turn into a heart stopping race for their lives. They are now the chosen prey of a force that relentlessly pursues them.

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers 2, (2003, Horror)
programme.desc: The Creeper terrorizes a group of varsity basketball players, cheerleaders and coaches who are stranded on a highway after their bus breaks down. Fighting their own fears and prejudices the group of athletes are forced to come together to stay alive.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: Rollerball, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jonathan Cross (Chris Klein) is an all-American hotshot, the most popular player in the fastest and most extreme sport of all time: Rollerball.

programme.title: The Woman in Black 2: Angel of Death, (2014, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: 40 years after the first haunting at Eel Marsh House, a group of children evacuated from WWII London arrives, awakening the house's darkest inhabitant.

programme.title: Bones And All, (2022, Drama)
programme.desc: In a world that cannot abide who they truly are, a young woman who is learning how to survive on the margins of society and an intense, disenfranchised drifter embark upon a road trip, searching for identity and chasing beauty in a perilous world.

programme.title: We Are What We Are, (2013, Thriller)
programme.desc: The Parkers, reclusive people who cling to ancient customs, find their secret lives threatened when a torrential downpour and the death of the family matriarch forces daughters Iris and Rose to assume special responsibilities.

programme.title: The Haunting In Connecticut, (2009, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: After a family is forced to relocate for their son's health, they begin experiencing supernatural behavior in their new home, which turns out to be a former mortuary and séance parlor.

programme.title: The Haunting in Connecticut 2: Ghosts of Georgia, (2013, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: When a family moves from the city to a centuries-old house in rural Georgia, they are terrorized by malicious spirits seeking revenge.

programme.title: Mandy, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: When a cult attacks, the shocking assault leads to vengeance.

programme.title: We Summon The Darkness, (2020, Satanic Stories)
programme.desc: A post-concert party at a remote country mansion turns into a grisly satanic slaughter scene in this dark-humored horror-thriller starring Alexandra Daddario and Johnny Knoxville.

programme.title: Horns, (2014, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A man wakes up after the death of his girlfriend to find he has grown horns.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction, (1987, Crime)
programme.desc: Michael Douglas plays Dan, a New York attorney who has a tryst with seductive Alex Forrest while his wife is away. Dan later shrugs off the affair as a mistake and considers it over. But Alex won't be ignored. Not now, not tomorrow, not ever.

programme.title: Hamburger Hill, (1987, War)

programme.desc: The mysterious Leon (Jean Reno) is New York's top hitman. When his next-door neighbors are murdered, Leon becomes the unwilling guardian of the family's sole survivor - 12-year-old Mathilda (Natalie Portman). Rating:R

programme.desc: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

programme.title: Mile 22, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: CIA operative Silva and his team race against time, facing military, police, and gangs, to transport an intelligence asset 22 miles to safety in Southeast Asia.

programme.title: Enough, (2002, Crime)
programme.desc: An abused wife on the run from her violent husband finally decides she's had enough.

programme.title: Bandits, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: The suave Joe and his hypochondriac partner Terry have escaped from prison. Cutting a swath from Oregon through California, these fugitives rob banks in order to finance their scheme for a new life south of the Border.

programme.title: Kiss the Girls, (1997, Thriller)

programme.desc: John Travolta performs as the troubled Tony Manero - Brooklyn paint store clerk by day and undisputed king of the dance floor by night. A powerful and provocative urban tragedy that carries as much significance today as it did in 1977.

programme.title: Rolling Thunder, (1977, Action)
programme.desc: William Devane and Tommy Lee Jones star as two former P.O.W.s out for revenge in this neo-noir action-thriller that Quentin Tarantino cites as one of his favorite films. Written by genre masters Paul Schrader and Heywood Gould. John Flynn directs.

programme.title: The Great Escape, (1963, War)

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night, (1967, Crime)
programme.desc: Sidney Poitier and Rod Steiger (who won a Best Actor Oscar® for his performance) shine in this classic mystery-thriller that took home five Academy Awards®, including Best Picture and Best Adapted Screenplay. Lee Grant and Warren Oates also star.

programme.title: Fist of Fury, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: A Bruce Lee Classic! Lee plays Chen Zhen, a student of Huo Yuanjia, who fights to defend the honor of the Chinese in the face of foreign aggression, and to bring to justice those responsible for his master's death.

programme.title: The Name of the Rose, (1986, Thriller)
programme.desc: In 1327, an enlightened friar and his young apprentice investigate a series of mysterious deaths at an abbey, risking the wrath of a powerful Inquisitor. Television adaptation of Umberto Eco's novel 'The Name of the Rose'.

programme.title: Chilly Scenes Of Winter, (1979, Comedy)
programme.desc: Charles (John Heard) loves Laura (Mary Beth Hurt). And Laura loves Charles. But when she changes her mind and returns to her husband, Charles decides to win her back, aided – and occasionally hindered – by his mixed bag of quirky friends and family.

programme.title: Fargo, (1996, Thriller)

programme.title: Fear of a Black Hat, (1994, Documentary)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Gong the Strong
programme.desc: When Gong’s old sparring partner sets a trap for Yuya, the only way Gong can save his friend is to forfeit his duel and get tossed from the tourney!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: The Pendulum Swings Both Ways: Part 1
programme.desc: Sylvio finally has just the thing to take Yuya down – a deck full of Pendulum Cards! Could Yuya's days in the spotlight be done for?
programme.sub-title: The Pendulum Swings Both Ways: Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: The Pendulum Swings Both Ways: Part 2
programme.desc: Yuya is off his game and on the run as Sylvio zeroes in on zeroing out his life points! If Yuya can’t get into the swing of things, this could be his final performance!
programme.sub-title: The Pendulum Swings Both Ways: Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Making the Cut: Part 1
programme.desc: Sora is psyched to put on a showstopping duel for the fans, but his opponent Shay is set to turn Sora’s one man show into a no man show!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Making the Cut: Part 2
programme.desc: Sora and Shay's heated duel hits its boiling point when dark secrets about their hidden history come to light! Could there be something sinister behind Sora’s sweet-toothed smile?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Sora’s Secrets: Part 1
programme.desc: While Yuto is looking for answers, Sora is looking to get some revenge! But when these two tangle, Yuya finds out more than he ever expected!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Sora’s Secrets: Part 2
programme.desc: Surprises are in the cards as the battle between Sora and Yuto comes to an unexpected conclusion! But just when Yuya thinks he’s seen everything, a new face shows up on the scene that makes Yuya do a triple take!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: A Dark Reflection
programme.desc: Yuya can’t believe his eyes when he finds himself standing face-to-face-to-face with two lookalikes who are out to destroy each other… and everything in sight!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Warped Dimensions
programme.desc: Yuya is in a coma, and nothing has been able to stir him from his terrifying state! Is Yuya down for the count, or will his duelmate’s ESP and TLC make him A-OK?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: A Duel Personality
programme.desc: It’s time for the second round of the Arc League Championship! Yuya is pitted against his polar opposite – a duelist who doesn't duel to entertain, but rather put his foes into pain!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Stealth Warriors
programme.desc: When a mysterious visitor threatens to throw the Championship into chaos, Declan moves in to uncover who they are and soon finds himself facing off against a merciless mercenary!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Bracing for Battle
programme.desc: Declan confronts Celina and shares a story from their past that reveals a frightening future!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Battle Fields
programme.desc: It’s time for a nail biting battle royal in the ARC League Championship! With four battle zones to choose from, the action has never been more mesmerizing or the duels more dangerous!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Fire and Ice
programme.desc: While Yuya is looking to knock the competition out cold in the Volcano Zone, the Iceberg Zone is heating up as Zuzu and Gong team up to defrost their foes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Danger Zones
programme.desc: As the battle royal rumbles on, Yuya finds himself caught in the crossfire when he stumbles across a battle between not-so-noble Knights!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Obelisk Assault
programme.desc: Yuya takes on a terrifying trio from Fusion Dimension who turn their victims into cards!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Dragon's Vengeance
programme.desc: Outnumbered, outmatched, and out of options, will Yuya tap into a deep-seeded darkness to overcome defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Identity Crisis
programme.desc: Zuzu races to stay one step ahead of a cold-blooded hunter who's hot on her heels! Can Zuzu ditch this danger, or will he prove too cunning for her to escape?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Battlefronts
programme.desc: Sparks fly in the Volcano Zone when all our heroes face off against the full fury of Fusion Dimension’s elite Obelisk Force! With more than life points on the line, the action has never been hotter!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Fighting for Fun
programme.desc: Are friends now foes as Yuya and Sora go deck to deck in a fiery face-off?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Dueling Declan
programme.desc: When Yuya discovers Declan's web of lies put his friends in danger, he challenges Declan to a battle as payback!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Kings vs. Dragons
programme.desc: Yuya’s battle with Declan takes a turn for the worse when Declan’s majestic monsters give Yuya the royal treatment!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Parental Guidance: Part 1
programme.desc: "It’s a family feud when Yuya takes on his mom in a duel where there’s more to lose than just his allowance! Can Yuya avoid being run down by Paradise City’s most feared motorcycle momma?"

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Parental Guidance: Part 2
programme.desc: The battle between Yuya and his mom kicks into high gear! Can Yuya avoid being grounded, or will Loco Yoko put the pedal to the metal and throttle her way to victory?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: City 'Scape
programme.desc: As Zuzu and Yugo try to unravel the riddle of Yuya's dimensional doubles, their sleuthing is cut short by Sector Security!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Tops Speed
programme.desc: Zuzu and Yugo redline their Duel Runner in a high-stakes Turbo Duel with Sector Security! Can they outrun the long arm of the law, or will Security put the brakes on their escape?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Synchro Sector
programme.desc: When Yuya and his pals arrive in the Synchro Dimension, Sector Security is waiting for them with open arms… and cuffs! Can Yuya smooth things out before Sylvio and Celina put a wrinkle in his plan?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Super Duelists
programme.desc: It’s a superheroic showdown in the Synchro Dimension pitting Super Gong against his arch-nemesis, Dennis the Destroyer!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Scream for the Green
programme.desc: Dennis and Gong are in for the ride of their lives when they’re introduced to the turbo-charged world of underground motorcycle dueling!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Dueling’s Most Wanted
programme.desc: The battle between Dashin’ Dennis and Sweet Baby Shay hits a speedbump when Sector Security pulls the plug on their Turbo Duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Showdown in the Slammer

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Hero’s Fall
programme.desc: With his deck on the line, Yuya looks to rock the cell block and KO the Kingpin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: The Great Escape

programme.title: Crocodile reveals his sinister motives for attacking Alabasta, and Nami tries to end her duel with Miss Doublefinger by unleashing the Clima Tact’s ultimate weapon: a devastatingly lethal tornado!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Secret Passed Down In The Royal Family! The Ancient Weapon Pluton!

programme.title: Zoro hopes to attain a new level of strength when he fights a foe with a body made of blades. The Straw Hat sword-slinger is determined to become a man who can cut steel – or die trying.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Secret Of Powerful Swordplay! Ability To Cut Steel And The Rhythm Things Have!

programme.title: Koza – the leader of the rebel army – finally discovers the evil mastermind behind Alabasta’s drought, but is he too late to prevent further bloodshed?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Battle is Over! Koza Raises the White Flag!

programme.title: When Koza is mysteriously shot, the rebellion is reborn, but Vivi’s cries for a cease-fire fall on deaf ears until a long-overdue hero swoops to the rescue!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Where Vivi's Voice Gets Heard! The Hero Descends!

programme.title: Luffy finally discovers the secret to knocking out a sandman, but it won’t matter unless Vivi and the rest of the Straw Hats can locate the Baroque Works bomber.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sand Croc and Water Luffy!... The Second Round of the Duel!

programme.title: While his mates search for a bomb, Luffy narrowly survives his second scrape with Crocodile. Across town, Nico Robin strong-arms Cobra into revealing his country’s greatest secret.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: That Looks Croc-ish!... Luffy, Run to the Royal Tomb!

programme.title: With the walls crumbling down around them, Crocodile attacks Luffy with a poisoned pirate hook. Meanwhile, Vivi draws a bead on the bombers, but can she stop them in time?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Nightmare Draws Near!... This is the Sand-Sand Clan's Secret Base

programme.title: The Straw Hats team up to give Vivi one last shot at disarming the bomb that threatens to destroy her city. She succeeds in cutting the fuse, but Crocodile has a backup plan.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Magnificent Wings! My Name is Pell, Guardian Deity of the Country

programme.title: Pell’s sacrifice spares his beloved city, but only an act of god can stop the rebellion. With Crocodile’s poison coursing through his body, Luffy musters a final attack against Alabasta’s oppressor.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Will Surpass You! Rain Falls in Alabasta.

programme.title: Crocodile is defeated, the rain has returned to Alabasta, and Vivi’s people are eager to rebuild their kingdom. As for the Straw Hats, they have a fleet of marines breathing down their necks.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Farewell to Arms! Pirates and Different Ideas of Justice!

programme.title: Now that the rebellion is over, Vivi must make an important decision about her future. The Straw Hats are ready to hoist the anchor, but an ambiguous villain has stolen the Going Merry!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Pirates' Banquet And Operation Escape From Alabasta!

programme.title: Mr. 2 is a man of many faces, but he finally shows his true colors when the marines attack the Straw Hats. Elsewhere, Vivi has a scheme up her sleeve, and it involves Igaram wearing a dress.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: It All Started On That Day...! Vivi Tells The Story Of Her Adventure!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew watch Alabasta fade into the distance, but there’s no time for reminiscing. The marines are in hot pursuit, and there’s a stowaway aboard the Going Merry!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Scent of danger! The seventh member is Nico Robin!

programme.title: Fresh off their adventure Alabasta, the Straw Hats discover an isolated island where they can restock their food supply. Chopper is left to guard the ship, but he and Nico spend the afternoon exploring instead!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The First Patient! The Untold Story Of The Rumble Ball!

programme.title: When a mail-order salesman gets lost at sea, Nami finds the paper she needs to start making maps. If the Straw Hat crew can somehow manage to survive a deadly cyclone, she might actually get some use out of it!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Uprising of the Navigator! For the Unyielding Dream!

programme.title: Heavy fog leads to a close encounter of the culinary kind when Nico fishes a marine out of the drink. The aspiring chef is concerned about the quality of his curry, and Sanji is just the guy to refine his recipe!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Recipe Handed Down! Sanji, the Iron Man of Curry

programme.title: A break in the rain provides the perfect opportunity for Usopp to help a young girl fulfill her dream of launching the world’s largest firework.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Will Make It Bloom! Usopp The Man And The Eight-Foot Shell!

programme.title: Money troubles force Zoro to tangle with Dick the Bandit and his treacherous gang of thugs. These gun-toting outlaws are terrorizing a peaceful village, and the Straw Hat swordsman aims to stop their reign of terror!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fabled Pirate Hunter! Zoro, The Wandering Swordsman

programme.title: A barrage of Marine cannon balls forces the Straw Hats to seek refuge on an uncharted island. Once ashore, the crew encounters a strange old man living amongst a herd of goats.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zenny Of The Island Of Goats And The Pirate Ship In The Mountains!

programme.title: Old man Zenny made a fortune lending money to scallywags, but he always dreamed of becoming a pirate himself. When the marines set out to trap the Straw Hats, the wily hermit may finally get his wish!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: How's Tricks? The Designs of Zenny the Moneylender!

programme.title: Zenny gets more than he bargained for when he embarks on his maiden pirate voyage. The Straw Hats may have made a friend for life, but what are they gonna do about those pesky marines?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Whereabouts of the Island Treasure! Attack of the Zenny Pirates!

programme.title: The Straw Hats stop for supplies at a harbor town plagued by a mayor who taxes anything and everything. Over lunch, Luffy and Nico befriend a kooky scientist who’s obsessed with the Rainbow Mist.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Legend Of The Rainbow Mist! Old Man Henzo Of Luluka Island

programme.title: Luffy, Usopp, Nico, and Zoro get trapped in the Rainbow Mist along with Henzo. The aging scientist is looking for answers, the Straw Hats want treasure, and the ghosts who haunt the mist want them all to leave!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Residents of the Land of Eternity! The Pumpkin Pirates

programme.title: Luffy and his crew search for a way out of Ape’s Concert, but the Rainbow Mist is an inescapable maze of madness. Back on shore, Nami, Chopper, and Sanji face a lifetime of hard labor for failing to pay their taxes!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Thoughts of Home! The Pirate Graveyard of No Escape!

programme.title: Nami enters the mist on a mission to save her mates – and maybe hunt for treasure while she’s at it. The local mayor wants her dead, but the Straw Hats are being protected by a mysterious marine.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Inevitable Melee! Wetton's Schemes and the Rainbow Tower

programme.title: The showdown with Mayor Wetton builds towards an explosive finale as the Straw Hats scramble to escape the Rainbow Mist – or be trapped inside forever.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: And So, the Legend Begins! To the Other Side of the Rainbow

programme.title: The Straw Hats are nearly crushed by the falling wreckage of a ship that’s over 200 years old. Could rumors of a floating island in the sky be true? Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji go scuba diving to find out!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Caught log! The king of salvagers, Masira!

programme.title: Still searching for a route to the island in the sky, the Straw Hats chart a course for Jaya. Meanwhile, Fire-Fist Ace crashes a party aboard a vessel helmed by Buggy the Pirate!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Monsters Appear! Don't Mess with The White Beard Pirates!

programme.title: The Straw Hats drop anchor at a town overrun by scallywags, so Nami makes the boys swear to stay out of trouble. But when the Bellamy Pirates come looking for a fight, Luffy may have to break his promise!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Quit Dreaming! Mock Town, The Town Of Ridicule!

programme.title: Nico’s handy work unearths a solitary dreamer who may know the way to Sky Island. All Luffy and his crew have to do is survive the sonic onslaught of simian salvagers seeking to sink the Going Merry!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Distinguished Pirates! A Man Who Talks Of Dreams And The King Of Undersea Search!

programme.title: Luffy and his mates reach the home of Mont Blanc Cricket: the man with the key to reaching Sky Island. There’s just one tiny problem – he comes from a long line of legendary liars.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Montblanc Cricket agrees to help the Straw Hats reach Sky Island, but first they must venture deep into the darkest depths of a spider-infested forest to capture a mysterious bird with a keen sense of direction.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Steer for the Clouds! Capture the South bird!!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd: Voyage to Danger
programme.desc: Someone sent orders to assassinate Lupin. Will he survive or die trying!?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #6 Dragon of Doom
programme.desc: On the bottom of the ocean, within the sunken Titanic, the golden dragon statue waits. When Lupin and the gang are hired to retrieve it, Goemon recognizes the dragon as one of his clan's treasures. Now, he's ready to fight his own friends to protect it!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Fujiko Mine, the devastatingly sexy lady thief who'll stop at nothing to make her steal, has her sights set on a religious cult's secret treasure when a new man waltzes into her life: Lupin III.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: A war is going down between the Italian and Chinese Mafias, and Fujiko ends up in the middle of it. A mysterious bodyguard named Daisuke Jigen stands at the heart of the matter, but who knows whose side he's really on?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: She's always getting in trouble / But she may give you a square deal / She's always sharing everything / Except for every steal / Even a lowly samurai / Is quick to see the appeal / How do you solve a problem like Fujiko Mine?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: The famous diva Aiyan's bejeweled mask has been targeted by Lupin the Third, and Zenigata determines to "set a thief to catch a thief." Who will get to the mask first: Fujiko or Lupin?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Using her womanly wiles, Fujiko convinces Lupin to retrieve the legendary Laughing Peacock from an Egyptian pyramid. However, the seemingly simple job turns into a fierce race when Jigen sets his sights on the treasure too.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Fujiko infiltrates a Catholic girls' school and sets about stealing all the maidens' hearts to pave the way for an even bigger theft. But Oscar knows exactly what she's up to, and he's got a plan to stop her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: The nation of Carib is in political upheaval, and Fujiko is in the thick of the action, naturally. What is she doing posing as a reporter? Will revolutionary Philadel Kest win her heart where Lupin has failed? And what is Goemon doing on that fighter jet?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: A fortune-teller supposedly able to predict his clients' deaths is for some reason seeking out Lupin's prior victims and giving them some very disturbing readings. What's the connection to Fujiko Mine, and how far will she go to see this job through?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Magical realism plus human trafficking plus Lupin and Daisuke Jigen plus a spa vacation plus Fujiko off the deep end equals... Well, you'll just have to find out.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Count Almeida has a job for Lupin, and he's not about to take no for an answer. When Lupin and Zenigata both separately make their way to the Count's villa seeking answers, the trail of clues leads to a ghost town with just one inhabitant.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: A recent string of particularly flashy thefts has been tied to Fujiko Mine, who seems to have taken to sending written warnings to the police just like Lupin does. But if you ask Inspector Zenigata, something smells fishy about the whole thing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: Oscar's body is missing, girls are being kidnapped all over the world, and Lupin still hasn't made good on his threat to steal Fujiko Mine. There's only one thing to do: It's time to pay a visit to one Count Luís Yu Almeida.
programme.sub-title: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine ( Part 1)

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine
programme.desc: In the season finale, all the players have finally come together, and it's time to see how the tale ends.
programme.sub-title: The Woman Called Fujiko Mine ( Part 2)

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #7 The Pursuit of Harimao's Treasure
programme.desc: To retrieve the Harimao's Treasure, Lupin and the gang must gather three lost statues. Lupin reluctantly partners with the aging "double-O" MI-6 agent Sir Archer and his granddaughter Diana to gather the statues.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #8 The Secret of Twilight Gemini
programme.desc: As Lupin's mentor Don Dolune lies on his deathbed, he hands the master thief a gift: the diamond named Twilight. But it's only half of the treasure-the other half of the Twilight can be found in Morocco…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Notorious gangster, Al Capone left behind five tiles that reveal the location of his massive gold hoard when put together. Out of the five tiles, Lupin and Fujiko have three in their possession.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata concocts an extravagant plan to finally capture Lupin by luring him in with a fake meteor made from 6 tons of pure gold. Low and behold, his plan backfires and Lupin and his gang make off with the meteor.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin sneaks into an old castle to steal a collection of priceless angel paintings, owned by the late Malcolm Hurst. Inside the castle, Lupin meets a mysterious girl named Flora, who knows the whereabouts of the angel paintings.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are out at sea attempting to retrieve the gold inside a sunken pirate ship. However, a female pirate gang interrupts their retrieval mission and both parties leave empty-handed.

programme.title: Skinwalkers, (2007, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A 12-year-old boy and his mother become the targets of two warring werewolf packs, each with different intentions and motives.

programme.title: Pompeii, (2014, Super Swashbucklers)
programme.desc: Set in 79 A.D., POMPEII tells the epic story of Milo, a slave turned invincible gladiator who finds himself in a race against time to save his true love, Cassia, the beautiful daughter of a wealthy merchant.

programme.title: The Mortal Instruments, (2013, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Clary's life is turned upside down when her mother is kidnapped and it's revealed that they are shadowhunters who are tasked with protecting the world from vampires, werewolves and demons. Clary must discover her talents and save her mother.

programme.title: Hansel and Gretel: Witch Hunters, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Get ready for a twisted take on the classic tale as Hansel and Gretel have turned pro, coping with the trauma of their childhood captivity by slaying witches for hire.

programme.title: Robocop, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: Detroit in the near future. A cop who dies in the line of duty is transformed into a crime-fighting cyborg by the corporation which now runs the police department. The only hitch: this "perfect" cop still seeks revenge on the creeps who mutilated him.

programme.title: Robocop 2, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: This first sequel pits Robocop against a gang of drug dealers and the title creature--a supposedly improved version of himself that has gone berserk.

programme.title: Robocop 3, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: In this second sequel to the 1987 hit, RoboCop leaves the force and joins the rebellion to battle the evil business corporation OCP, which uses a police-like group to remove the homeless people who populate the site of a future upscale development.

programme.title: Cyborg, (1989, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi thriller as Gibson Rickenbacker, the future's most fearsome warrior. In the wake of a plague, Rickenbacker must rescue the only person who can develop a vaccine and save civilization.

programme.title: The Big Country, (1958, Drama)
programme.desc: Burl Ives earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his portrayal of a family patriarch involved in a bitter land feud in this explosive western drama that also features a sumptuous musical score.

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: Big Jake, (1971, Drama)
programme.desc: An aging Texas cattle man who has outlived his time swings into action when outlaws kidnap his grandson and wound his son.

programme.title: Hondo, (1953, Drama)
programme.desc: John Wayne plays Hondo Lane, a cavalry rider who becomes the protector of Angie Lowe as well as a father figure to her boy, Johnny. Angie, determinedly awaiting the return of her husband, refuses to leave their homestead despite the growing danger.

programme.title: Rio Lobo, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: This fifth and final collaboration between John Wayne and director Howard Hawks is an action-filled Western set after the Civil War, in which a group of men seek out Union traitors responsible for a string of train robbers.

programme.title: Sabata, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: Get ready for fast-paced, explosive action as Lee Van Cleef stars as Sabata, the mysterious, steely-eyed gunslinger who, after he discovers the masterminds behind an elaborate bank heist, imposes his bullet-laced brand of justice on a guilty town.

programme.title: Barbarosa, (1982, Drama)
programme.desc: A young cowboy hooks up with a legendary outlaw, and before long both are on the run from the law.

programme.title: Whirlwind, (1951, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry arrives in Red Bluff to work on the investigation of mail robberies. U.S. Bonds are stolen, and Smiley finds burned fragments of them. A henchman confesses who the guilty party is.

programme.title: Stranger Than Fiction, (2006, Dramedy)
programme.desc: An IRS auditor suddenly finds himself the subject of narration only he can hear: narration that begins to affect his entire life, from his work, to his love-interest, to his death.

programme.title: The Brothers Bloom, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: The con is on when two swindlers (Adrien Brody, Mark Ruffalo) make an heiress (Rachel Weisz) the target of their next scheme.

programme.title: The Perfect Score, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Scarlett Johansson, Erika Christensen, Chris Evans, and Darius Miles lead this coming-of-age tale about six students who break into the testing center and steal the answers to the S.A.T.

programme.title: The Lookout, (2007, Thriller)
programme.desc: Chris "Slapshot" Pratt, whose once-bright future has been dimmed by a severe head injury, is a night janitor at a bank. Lonely and frustrated, he falls prey to a con man and agrees to help rob the bank where he works.

programme.title: The Score, (2001, Thriller)
programme.desc: When safe cracker Nick decides it's time to settle down with his girlfriend Diane and stick to his legitimate business, running a jazz nightclub, his friend and partner Max has other plans.

programme.title: The Perfect Score, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Scarlett Johansson, Erika Christensen, Chris Evans, and Darius Miles lead this coming-of-age tale about six students who break into the testing center and steal the answers to the S.A.T.

programme.title: The Lookout, (2007, Thriller)
programme.desc: Chris "Slapshot" Pratt, whose once-bright future has been dimmed by a severe head injury, is a night janitor at a bank. Lonely and frustrated, he falls prey to a con man and agrees to help rob the bank where he works.

programme.title: The Score, (2001, Thriller)
programme.desc: When safe cracker Nick decides it's time to settle down with his girlfriend Diane and stick to his legitimate business, running a jazz nightclub, his friend and partner Max has other plans.

programme.title: As the members of the group remain helpless, Negan takes action that will forever haunt those who survive.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: For a number of familiar faces, a new, well-established community seems too good to be true.

programme.title: A new group of survivors seem to have it all in their impressive community; however, there is a price.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The remaining members of the group try to keep it together in Alexandria; they receive a sobering visit.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Saddled with grief and surrounded by enemies, members of the group try to find safety at the Hilltop before it's too late.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Someone stumbles upon a brand new society unlike anything seen before.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: A deeper look at the Sanctuary and the world of the Saviors; members of Alexandria look for supplies.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Negan's unwelcome visit to Alexandria continues as other members scavenge for supplies; things quickly spin out of control.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Rick and the others are led to a new community, where they meet the residents and their ruler; a familiar face resurfaces.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: While searching for a missing Alexandrian, Rick and his group encounter a mysterious collective, its inhabitants unlike any they have come across.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: An Alexandrian discovers they must navigate the mysterious, confusing and terrifying world within the Saviors' compound.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The group scavenges for supplies; back in Alexandria, someone must make a morally challenging decision.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Things do not go as planned when a group of Kingdommers delivers goods to the Saviors during a routine supply drop-off.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Saviors visit the Hilltop unexpectedly, surprising everyone, with plans of taking more than supplies.

programme.title: A group of Alexandrians embarks on a journey; one member of the group must make a heartbreaking decision.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The stakes continue to grow higher as paths cross; the group enacts an intricate plan.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead
programme.sub-title: The First Day of the Rest of Your Life

programme.title: Rick and his group, along with the Kingdom and Hilltop, have banded together to bring the fight to Negan and the Saviors.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Princess Kakyu appears before the Sailor Guardians. Princess Kakyu explains that she has come to Earth in search of the Light of Hope.
programme.sub-title: Crusade for the Galaxy: Legend of the Sailor Wars

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi finally confesses to Rei that she’s been unable to get in touch with Mamoru. The Three Lights publicly announce their intention to disband.
programme.sub-title: Princess Kakyu Perishes: Advent of Galaxia

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Princess Kakyu perishes after being defeated by Galaxia. The Sailor Star Lights go after Galaxia to avenge their fallen princess.
programme.sub-title: Countdown to Destruction: The Sailor Guardians' Last Battle

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Mars, Mercury, Jupiter and Venus lose their star seeds after shielding Sailor Moon and the Star Lights from Galaxia’s attack.
programme.sub-title: Ruler of the Galaxy: The Menace of Galaxia

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Uranus and Neptune have turned against the Sailor Guardians by swearing allegiance to Galaxia.
programme.sub-title: Dying Stars: Uranus and Neptune's Last Stand

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Galaxia is revealed to be the Legendary Sailor Guardian who sealed away Chaos. She has become corrupt and has gone on to conquer the galaxy herself.
programme.sub-title: The Light of Hope: The Final Battle for the Galaxy

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: As Galaxia closes in to take Sailor Moon’s star seed, the Light of Hope reveals itself. The Light of Hope begs Usagi to use its power to stop Galaxia.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Love: The Moonlight Illuminates the Galaxy

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi Tsukino is a schoolgirl who meets a talking cat named Luna. Usagi is transformed into Sailor Moon, the guardian who fights for love and justice.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A house of fortune opens up and gains popularity for its predictions. The customers begin to act violent. Usagi and Luna decide to investigate.
programme.sub-title: Punishment Awaits: The House Of Fortune Is The Monster Mansion

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls in town are tuning in to a radio program that reads out love letters. A sleeping sickness is plaguing the town that puts people to sleep.
programme.sub-title: The Mysterious Sleeping Sickness: Protect the Girls In Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi is shocked to find out that she’s gained weight from too much eating. Determined to get back into shape, Usagi and her friends join a gym.
programme.sub-title: Learn How to Be Skinny from Usagi

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Shingo brings home a pet Chanela. Shingo becomes so absorbed in the Chanela that he stops going to school, which worries Usagi.
programme.sub-title: Scent of a Monster: Chanela Will Steal Your Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi bumps into Yusuke Amade, a famous musician who claims he is being chased by a monster. Usagi and Luna decide to keep an eye on Yusuke.
programme.sub-title: Protect the Melody of Love: Usagi Plays Cupid

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Naru dream of becoming famous like Mikan Shiratori. When the girls hear that Mikan is hosting a talent contest, they see their chance.
programme.sub-title: Usagi Learns Her Lesson: Becoming a Star Is Hard Work

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi befriends Ami Mizuno, the school’s smartest girl. But Luna, who senses an unknown energy coming from Ami, suspects her of being a Monster.
programme.sub-title: The Girl Genius Is a Monster: The Brainwashing Cram School of Horror

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Ami find a clock that resembles Luna. That night, the clock emits a strange light that causes Usagi to become very impatient.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Disaster: Beware of the Clock of Confusion

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: People who take the bus near the Hikawa Shrine have started to go missing. Usagi and her friends decide to investigate.
programme.sub-title: The Cursed Bus: Enter Mars, the Guardian of Fire

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Sailor Guardians go to the amusement park where visitors have gone missing. But Usagi is more focused on playing than finding the missing people.
programme.sub-title: Usagi vs. Rei: Nightmare in Dream Land

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rei goes off on a luxury cruise with Ami after winning tickets through the local lottery. Feeling left behind, Usagi sneaks aboard the ship.
programme.sub-title: I Want a Boyfriend: The Luxury Cruise Ship is a Trap

programme.title: Sailor Moon
